content: Another week, another shiny hunt: Tuesday the 24th, Wednesday the 25th, and Thursday the 26th I am giving away 1 million pokeyen each day to the player who catches the first shiny of the day. Second place will receive 500k pokeyen, and 3rd place will receive 250k. Please don't forget to post them in the shiny-flex channel! Good luck and happy shunting this week everyone!!
had to leave a little early this week, 1st place today has already been claimed with Mystic's Smeargle, if 2nd or 3rd place are achieved, I will send the money when I next log in. Good luck everyone!

Just a friendly reminder that this bounty will be ending soon! New week, new bounties. You know the rules. I am giving 1 million pokeyen to the first player to catch a shiny pokemon each day during July 1st, 2nd, and 3rd. Second Place will receive 500,000, and third place will receive 250,000. Good luck everyone, and happy shunting!
Bounty has been claimed by @limiterbash Your reward will be sent to you shortly!

tyty, Pleasure doing business w you

Do you like money? I will give 1 million pokeyen to the first player to catch a shiny each day on Tuesday the 8th, Wednesday the 9th, and Thursday the 10th. Second place each day will receive 500,000, and third place will receive 250,000. Don't forget to post them in shiny-flex channel so I can tell who caught what and when. Good luck, and happy shunting!!

So... Shiny Wars has a little over 2 weeks until it ends. From now until they announce Shiny Wars is over, I am paying a bounty of 1 million pokeyen for every single shiny caught by our Shiny Wars team. Make me regret this decision, go catch those shiny pokemon! Good luck and happy hunting!
